nodes.text: Andando was the innermost planet of the Ando system, a star system located within the Lambda sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim and the Slice region. Ando's sister planet, it orbited the star Ando and had no moons. Andando was ravaged in the aftermath of an Aqualish war several decades after the species discovered space travel. They systematically stripped the planet of its resources and blasted its surface into molten rock, rendering Andando uninhabitable.

Andando was first mentioned, albeit indirectly, in Galaxy Guide 4: Alien Races, a Star Wars Legends supplement written by Troy Denning for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and released on June 1, 1989. It was first identified in "Ando: Planet of the Walrus Men," a "Planet Hoppers" article written by Cory J. Herndon for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game and published on July 3, 2003. The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, placed the Ando system, and therefore Andando, in grid square Q-15.
